MemoryInfobox.description: 'The only thing that stood between Thaletas and Spartan reinforcements was the most powerful navy in the world. So Kassandra mobilized the 'Adrestia' to attack the impassable Athens|Athenian fleet.'

General_Description: '''The Thaletas Way''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met with [[Thaletas]] at his camp after the meeting with [[Kyra]].
Section_Dialogue:
After the meeting between Kyra and Thaletas, Kassandra returned to the Spartan camp, where Thaletas gave a rousing speech to his men from the deck of a wrecked ship. *'''Thaletas:''' ''Spartans! Many brothers were lost to the Athenian dogs. But we are still here!
The Battle of the [[Battle of Thermopylae|Three Hundred]]? [[Leonidas I of Sparta|Leonidas]] was lucky to have that many men!
Today we honor the fallen. Today we send our enemies to [[Hades]]!
Kyra will fight and die for her people. We will do the same!
We don't go home until these islands are ours. [[Delos]] called. Sparta answered!'' Kassandra climbed aboard to Thaletas' side and clapped. |-|Kyra's plan= *'''Thaletas:''' ''Kassandra, I didn't think you'd come here after calling my plan a suicide mission.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''And miss your speech? Never.'' |-|Thaletas' plan= *'''Kassandra:''' ''A fine speech.'' Regardless, Thaletas resented the "speech" remark. *'''Thaletas:''' ''Athenians give speeches. Spartans give orders.'' |-|Flirt - What orders would you give me?= *'''Kassandra:''' ''If I was under your command, what would you order me to do?'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''Same thing I order my men. Bruised, bloody, or broken, never hold back.'' {{#tag:tabber| I never hold back.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I never hold back.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''I can tell.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I wasn't talking about fighting.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''I know, and I'm tempted.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''But?'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''But I sailed here for Kyra. She's the one I fight for... for now.'' {{!}}-{{!}} So you like things rough.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Bruised, bloody, or broken? That can be arranged.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''My heart beats faster, ''misthios.'' But...'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''But?'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''But I sailed here for Kyra. She's the one I fight for... for now.'' {{!}}-{{!}} Hard shell, soft center.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''You act tough. But I'm sure there's a softer side to you.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''That's why Spartans carry shields.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Shields have never stopped me.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''You're a bold one, ''misthios''. But Kyra needs us.'' }} *'''Kassandra:''' ''Well, if you're going to win these islands for her, you'll need more soldiers.'' |-|Let's plan our next move.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Your men are brave, but they won't be enough. We need those reinforcements.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''They'd never get here alive. The Athenian navy is too powerful, and our ship is at the bottom of the sea.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''[[Adrestia|Mine]] isn't.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''You'd confront them in open waters? Not sure if you're brave or just mad.'' |-|Challenge accepted.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''The Adrestia and I have faced greater challenges than a few Athenian ships.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''You fight like [[Achilles]] reborn, but even you couldn't defeat the entire navy.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''But if I sink enough ships, the Spartans can get through.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''There's something else. A helmet was left on board my ship. It was my pater's.'' (If the helmet was already acquired) {{#tag:tabber| I already have your helmet.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''You wouldn't be talking about this helmet, would you?'' She handed over the helmet. *'''Thaletas:''' ''You found it! This saved me more times than I can count.'' {{!}}-{{!}} Lie - We'll see.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll sink the ships, but I'm not making any promises about a helmet.'' }} |-|I'll sink the ships later. (else) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll sink the ships, but I'm not making any promises about a helmet.'' |-|How many Athenian ships should I sink?= *'''Kassandra:''' ''You've been here long enough - how many ships protect Delos?'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''You'll never sink them all. We just need to punch a hole in their patrols, enough to send them scrambling.'' |-|What's so special about the helmet?= *'''Kassandra:''' ''So the helmet from your ''pater'' means a lot to you?'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''It does. He pried it from his ''pater'' on the battlefield of [[Hot Gates of Thermopylai|Thermopylai]].'' |-|Where did your ship sink?= *'''Kassandra:''' ''The sea's a big place. Where did your ship sink exactly?'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''Somewhere off the northern coast of [[Mykonos]]. We could see [[Miltiades Fort]] as we swam to shore.'' |-|I know what to do.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''The [[Great white shark|sharks]] will have full bellies when I'm done.'' [[File:ACOD The Thaletas Way 4.png|thumb|250px|The ''Adrestia'' preparing to attack an Athenian ship]] Kassandra set sail and sank an Athenian ship. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You're food for the sharks now, Athenians!'' She sank another. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Thaletas sends his regards, Athenian scum!'' She sank a third. *'''[[Barnabas]]:''' ''By [[Ares]], that should do it! Though, if we sink more, the Athenian forces will crumble.'' Kassandra returned to Thaletas victorious. *'''Thaletas:''' ''You're back! I overheard fishermen telling tales of the Adrestia cutting through the sea.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''The Athenian navy is scrambling.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''Ha! Let their blood feed the sharks.'' (If the helmet was recovered) |-|Here's your helmet.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''There's more. I have your helmet right here. Take it.'' She handed over the helmet. *'''Thaletas:''' ''It saved me more times than I can count. Thank you.'' |-|Lie - I didn't find your helmet.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Don't thank me yet. Your father's helmet is gone.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''I... can't even remember his face anymore. That helmet was all I had left of him. But, you broke the navy. That will be my vengeance.'' (If the helmet was not recovered) *'''Kassandra:''' ''Don't thank me yet. Your father's helmet is gone.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''I... can't even remember his face anymore. That helmet was all I had left of him. But, you broke the navy. That will be my vengeance.'' |-|We're not done yet.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''The Athenians will retaliate for what I've done, unless we hit them first.'' |-|You have heart.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''You have heart, but your troops are your family now. The Athenians will want to kill all of us for what I've done.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''Then we need to strike first.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Exactly.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''If that's the plan, we attack their commanders. Athenians are sheep. Kill the shepherd, and the flock will flee.'' (Accept - "I'll kill the commanders.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''March on them and they'll see you coming. I work better alone. I'll take care of these commanders.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''You're going straight for their throats.'' He paused for a moment. *'''Thaletas:''' ''Still... leave some Athenian blood for me.'' [[File:ACOD The Thaletas Way 9.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra and Thaletas discuss the Athenian commanders]] (If players asked "Where are the Athenian commanders?") *'''Kassandra:''' ''I need to know where to find them.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''Kyra's spies tracked all three of them. One guards the [[Suenites Quarry|quarry]]. One's camped [[Leleges Military Camp|nearby]].'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''And the third?'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''Him, we don't know.'' (If players asked "What are their names?") *'''Kassandra:''' ''I want names, Thaletas.'' *'''Thaletas:''' ''[[Tisandros]] commands the Athenian elite guard. [[Polemion]] is their strategist. And the last, a general named [[Neokles]], is missing.'' (Leave - "I know what I have to do.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''When the commanders are dead, and more Spartans arrive, there will be plenty of blood for both of us.'' Thaletas took his leave of Kassandra.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra punched a hole in the Athenian naval patrols, allowing Spartan reinforcements to slip through and land on Mykonos.
Section_Trivia:
*The player can equip [[Thaletas' Helmet]] as a Rare-grade helmet, if it is found during this quest but withheld from him. The "quest item" version of the helmet can still be given to Thaletas at the end of [[Paint the Sand Red]], which removes it as a quest item in the player's inventory while retaining the wearable "copy" that the game generated for the player's use. The helmet can be very useful, given its default engraving of "+% Chance to Ignore Half Damage."
*The flirting dialog option "So you like things rough." is not available if Kassandra lied to Thaletas and told him she's not Spartan when they first met during mission [[Trouble in Paradise]].
